dmca.title: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17 USC 512 (c)
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Justin S. [mailto:webmaster@proxify.com] 
Posted At: Wednesday, May 10, 2006 1:31 PM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per
17 USC 512 (c)
Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement/DMCA Take Down Demand per 17
USC 512 (c)


To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing to file a notice of copyright infringement in accordance
with the Digital Millennium Copyright Act.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on "http://
proxify.com/". Proxify.com is a wholly owned subsidiary of UpsideOut,
Inc. and has been in operation since 2003-04-14.

2. The material that we believe is infringing the copyrighted work
listed in item #1 appears on "http://littleproxy.com/index.php" which is
located at IP address "67.18.208.118". Specifically, the material is,
"LittleProxy.com is a free web-based anonymous proxy service which
allows anyone to surf the Web privately and securely. Just enter a URL
(website address) in the form above, you can use websites but they
cannot uniquely identify or track you. LittleProxy.com hides your IP
address and our encrypted connection prevents monitoring of your network
traffic.". This material is copied substantially except that all the
appearances of our trademark and tradename "Proxify"  
have been changed to their name.


3. My contact information:
Name: Justin Schlecter
Company: UpsideOut, Inc. D.B.A Proxify
Address: 1333A N. Ave., STE 315, New Rochelle, NY 10804
Phone: 1-877-PROXIFY
Email: webmaster@proxify.com


4. Contact information for the owner of the allegedly infringing
material:
    ServerCube.com
    Server Cube (tokyofriends@gmail.com)
    +1.3475636346
    Fax: +1.2123345169
    Prince Street Station
    P.O. Box 55
    New York, NY 10012
    US

5. I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials
described above as allegedly infringing is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.

Signed,
Justin Schlecter, 2006-05-10
Proxify.com Administrator
1-877-PROXIFY
